means: 将（刀、剑等）插入鞘( sheathe的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The effect of nitrogen can be overcome by sheathing the flame in argon.
sentence.Network_cn: 氮的影响则可以通过用氩气包覆火焰而予以克服.

sentence.Network_en: Sheathing layer: PVC extruded polyethylene or in the form of weaving.
sentence.Network_cn: 护套层: 用聚乙烯或聚氯乙烯挤塑在编织层上而成的.

sentence.Network_en: Fixed an issue where Fist weapons were sheathing improperly.
sentence.Network_cn: 修正了拳套武器不正常遮罩的错误.

髓鞘（myelin sheath）是一层脂肪组织，包裹在某些神经元的轴突外，具有绝缘作用并提高神经冲动的传导速度，并有保护轴突的作 …

entry.def: If something is sheathed in a material or other covering, it is closely covered with it.

example.ex: The television was sheathed in a snug coverlet.
example.tran: 电视机用一个床罩严严实实地盖住了。

example.ex: ...her long legs, sheathed in sheer black tights.
example.tran: 她那裹在一条纯黑的紧身裤下的修长的双腿

entry.def: When someone sheathes a knife, they put it in its sheath.

example.ex: He sheathed the knife and strapped it to his shin.
example.tran: 他将刀插入鞘中,绑在小腿上。

means.word_mean: 1. protective covering consisting, for example, of a layer of boards applied to the studs and joists of a building to strengthen it and serve as a foundation for a weatherproof exterior

auth_sentence.content: The moisture barrier is provided by a building paper stapled to the sheathing.
auth_sentence.res_content: The moisture barrier is provided by a building paper stapled to the sheathing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The moisture barrier is provided by a building paper stapled to the sheathing.

auth_sentence.content: My diagnosis is that the myelin sheathing around my nerves was not being repaired because of a lack of cholesterol.
auth_sentence.res_content: My diagnosis is that the myelin sheathing around my nerves was not being repaired because of a lack of cholesterol.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My diagnosis is that the myelin sheathing around my nerves was not being repaired because of a lack of cholesterol.

auth_sentence.content: Ziegler had washed from the tin sheathing of the booth the chalk marks put there by boys of the neighborhood the night before.
